title: shrI krSNO mAm rakSatu
sahitya:
shrI krSNO mAm rakSatu guruguhAnandO varah


anupallavi

 sakrdArAdhita tOSa sakala sura brnda vanditah


caraNam   vasudEvasutO varadO kAncI nagara vihArO kamsa cANUra marddakO 
kauntEya hita bOdhakO nAsAmaNi dharO navanIta cOra dhIrO 
nava nava gOpa strI rAsa kRIDA vESadharO harih
